properties.name: spring.grpc.security.csrf.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable CSRF protection on gRPC requests.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.reflection.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Reflection on the gRPC server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.exception-handling.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable user-defined global exception handling on the gRPC server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.servlet.enabled
properties.description: Whether to use a servlet server in a servlet-based web application (set to false to force a native gRPC server).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.observations.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Observations on the server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.client.observations.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Observations on the client.
